metadata.title: CVE-2023-52524 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: nfc: llcp: Add lock when modifying device listThe device list needs its associated lock held when modifying it, or thelist could become corrupted, as syzbot discovered.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
